Ivory Tower Wizard Belkadhi:
Put your hand on the head of Magical Owls and think about what you want to convey. She will remember your message and send it to the recipient.
Magic Owl can travel long distances, to convey the message. You don't have to write.
When You pass her a message, you cannot think about anything else. Otherwise Magical Owl will give everything, what were You thinking at this moment. Ha-ha-ha!
So You want to use the Magic Owl?
